page.title: 04Killerby Hall Farm
page.content: This land has been farmed by the {Stobbs Family}for 4 generations since 1885. It is owned by{Lord Barnard}of {Raby Estates}and{Raby Castle}. Mr. N.Stobbs is a tenant farmer paying a rent to Lord Barnard. The farm covers 366 acres, about 2 miles north to south and a mile from east to west. Buildings, wasteland and quarries take up about 10 acres,so Mr.Stobbs farms about 356 acres , 45 acres of grass for sheep and 311 acres of arable land. Mr.Stobbs employs 2 fulltime men who live in the village and Mrs. Stobbs helps at busy times eg.Lambing.
